lead_paragraph: Fresh out of a break-up with his American girlfriend and freaked out that he is almost 30 and single, Ravi Patel goes on a family vacation to India with his head and heart spinning. Ravi is desperate to find love and is willing to do whatever it takes. Through his journey to India, he realizes that the inner workings of his culture that inevitably lead back to the pre-arranged marriage might not be so terrible. In his family, everyone has the last name Patel. Patels marry other Patels. It's not incest, it means they are from the same 50-square mile radius in India. Struck with how happy the marriages are of his Patel family and friends, Ravi decides to embark on a worldwide search for another American Patel just like him.
